sqlMap.insert: insert into semi_employees (emp_no, emp_password, emp_name, emp_email, emp_phone, emp_dept_no, emp_position_no, emp_type) values (semi_employees_seq.nextval, #password#, #name#, #email#, #phone#, #deptNo#, #positionNo#, #type#)
sqlMap.select: select E.emp_no as empNo, E.emp_photo as photo, E.emp_name as name, E.emp_email as email, E.emp_phone as phone, E.emp_dept_no as deptNo, E.emp_position_no as positionNo, E.emp_deleted as deleted, E.emp_created_date as createdDate, E.emp_updated_date as updatedDate, E.emp_deleted_date as deletedDate, E.emp_type as type, D.department_name as departmentName, P.position_name as positionName, P.position_seq as positionSeq from (select row_number() over (order by emp_no desc) row_numbers, emp_no, emp_photo, emp_name, emp_email, emp_phone, emp_dept_no, emp_position_no, emp_deleted, emp_created_date, emp_updated_date, emp_deleted_date, emp_type from semi_employees ) E, semi_departments D, semi_positions P where E.emp_dept_no = D.department_no and E.emp_position_no = P.position_no and row_numbers between #begin# and #end# order by E.emp_no desc

select emp_no as no, emp_password as password, emp_photo as photo, emp_name as name, emp_email as email, emp_phone as phone, emp_dept_no as deptNo, emp_position_no as positionNo, emp_deleted as deleted, emp_created_date as createdDate, emp_updated_date as updatedDate, emp_deleted_date as deletedDate, emp_type as type from semi_employees where emp_no = #value# emp_email = #value#

select emp_no as no, emp_password as password, emp_photo as photo, emp_name as name, emp_email as email, emp_phone as phone, emp_dept_no as deptNo, emp_position_no as positionNo, emp_deleted as deleted, emp_created_date as createdDate, emp_updated_date as updatedDate, emp_deleted_date as deletedDate, emp_type as type from semi_employees where emp_deleted = 'Y' and emp_no = #value#

select emp_no as no, emp_password as password, emp_photo as photo, emp_name as name, emp_email as email, emp_phone as phone, emp_dept_no as deptNo, emp_position_no as positionNo, emp_deleted as deleted, emp_created_date as createdDate, emp_updated_date as updatedDate, emp_deleted_date as deletedDate, emp_type as type from semi_employees where emp_deleted = 'Y' order by emp_no desc
sqlMap.update: update semi_employees set emp_password = #password#, emp_photo = #photo#, emp_name = #name#, emp_email = #email#, emp_phone = #phone#, emp_dept_no = #deptNo#, emp_position_no = #positionNo#, emp_deleted = #deleted#, emp_updated_date = sysdate, emp_deleted_date = #deletedDate#, emp_type = #type# where emp_no = #no#
